name: Metagross GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Geotech System
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a {P} or {M} Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Hammer
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Giga Hammer during your next turn.

attacks.name: Algorithm GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
